Package io.github.kale_ko.ejcl.mysql

Class UnstructuredMySQLConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kale_ko.ejcl.UnstructuredConfig
      • io.github.kale_ko.ejcl.mysql.UnstructuredMySQLConfig
  • public class UnstructuredMySQLConfig
extends UnstructuredConfig
    An Unstructured MySQL Config for storing data on a MySQL or MariaDB server

    3.0.0
    Version:
    5.0.0
